title: BRIT Awards 2017: All the outfits
text:
Ellie Goulding wowed in this daring black gown which featured a dramatic open neckline and thigh high split. Ellie paired the chain embellished gown with co-ordinating black and silver pointed heels and wore her blonde hair down and loose. Photo: © Getty Images 
Little Mix showed off their individual style in contrasting black, white and denim gowns. While Jesy looked vampy in a black zip-through leather dress, Perrie donned a black bustier gown with dramatic feather train detail. Leigh-Anne turned heads in a patchwork denim dress with lacing and frayed detailing, and Jade completed the line-up in a white gown with a daring split leg and long black gloves. Photo: © Getty Images 
Michelle Keegan wowed as she arrived at the O2 Arena on the arm of her husband Mark Wright. 
The HELLO! Online blogger wore a cobalt blue bandeau jumpsuit with a black waist belt, adding metallic silver heels and a co-ordinating clutch bag to complete the look. 
Rita Ora looked stunning in this khaki sheer embellished gown, with slicked back hair and metallic make-up to complement the look. Photo: © Getty Images 
Dua Lipa mastered this season's tailoring trend in a black tuxedo suit, which she accessorised with a delicate necklace, drop earrings and barely there sandals. Photo: © Getty Images 
Fearne Cotton ticked off two trends in one in this off-the-shoulder black dress with ruffle skirt detail. Photo: © Getty Images 
Abbey Clancy showed off her model physique in this one-shoulder asymmetric mini dress and strappy heels. Photo: © Getty Images 
Clean Bandit star Grace Chatto matched her outfit to her new blue hairstyle in this plunging satin jumpsuit and co-ordinating clutch bag. 
Scottish singer Tallia Storm looked stylish as ever in this lilac and green ruffled Gucci ensemble. The 18-year-old said it was "an honour" to be dressed by the fashion house for her red carpet appearance at the BRIT Awards. Photo: © Getty Images 
Ed Sheeran dressed up for his return to the BRITs in a black suit and poloneck jumper. Photo: © Getty Images 
Clara Paget knows you can never go wrong in a black dress. The model paired her mesh detail gown with a leather biker jacket and strappy heels. Photo: © Getty Images 
Best female nominee Nao looked gorgeous in this white crop top and skirt co-ord with colourful feather print. Photo: © Getty Images 
Lianne La Havas wore a sheer floral embellished dress for her red carpet appearance. The singer teamed the long-sleeved dress with a chunky choker and black platform heels. Photo: © Getty Images
